original_body_lines: We did mention last Tuesday (30 May), that singer Janaka Palapathwala was working on a new identity, and that he would reveal to us soon, what he has in mind.
According to Janaka, many of his fans, those abroad, especially, find it difficult to pronounce Palapathwala!
Believe me, I find the going tough, as well…Pala-path-wala. A tongue-twister, indeed!
Henceforth, Janaka will be known as JPal and he has worked out a logo, as well.
Obviously, music lovers would now have no problem, whatsoever, in saying JPal…it’s as simple as ABC!
UNESCO, the Cultural Triangle and some forunate contacts in Paris
